alert.note: Alert for Christian; Trigg (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 09 at 5:33PM EST until January 10 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...Forecast flooding changed to Minor severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in Kentucky... South Fork Little River at Hopkinsville Bypass affecting Trigg and Christian Counties. .This morning`s heavy rainfall has resulted in the Little River level rising above the flood stage at Hopkinsville - Bypass. It will remain above flood stage for just a few hours before falling back below. For the Little River...including Hopkinsville - Bypass...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...South Fork Little River at Hopkinsville - Bypass. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:30 PM CST Sunday the stage was 18.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this evening and continue falling to 8.9 feet tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
